meta.title: Custom Software Solutions for Startups
meta.description: This is Codex Software landing page

title: We help Software Startups
Plan, Build and Evolve
Software Solutions.
welcome.subtitle: Refine your idea. Create a killer MVP. Scale or pivot your product.

articleWithImageAndText.title: How We Work
articleWithImageAndText.text: Explore our Lean startup approach to software product development

articleWithImageAndText2.title: Analysis and Prototyping
articleWithImageAndText2.subtitle: Evaluate and refine your idea
list: Share the idea and proceed through a series of interviews to evaluate and refine it, set goals, define and document the scope of work.
Learn how to get your product to market at the optimal price, speed, and quality.
Receive a clickable Prototype and a Product Brief with timeline & costs to develop an MVP.

articleWithImageAndText3.title: MVP Development
articleWithImageAndText3.subtitle: Validate your idea, affordably.
list: Get your Minimum Viable Product designed, developed and tested.
Evaluate market fit and traction, gather feedback from real users.
Gather insights for further evolution of your software product

articleWithImageAndText4.title: Product Evolution
articleWithImageAndText4.subtitle: Grow, Scale or Pivot your Software
list: Hire a development team to deal with infrastructure setup, design, software development, and QA.
Get help in  Product Roadmap development and Agile delivery process setup.
Monitor development progress easily via regular meetings and day-to-day direct contact with the team.

imageBoxes.title: Orgafly
imageBoxes.description: Orgafly is a print-on-demand software platform designed to optimize the workflow of event organizers, providing the means to distribute and print high-quality and personalized tickets. We developed the product, set up and maintained the infrastructure, and ensured product quality.

imageBoxes.title: Customis3D
imageBoxes.description: We developed a print-on-demand dropshipping eCommerce app for Shopify, allowing store owners to sell various customizable print-on-demand products - from phone cases to yoga mats, towels, and blankets, - without any need for inventory, production, or logistics.

imageBoxes.title: Audit Angel
imageBoxes.description: Audit Angel is a healthcare software platform that allows healthcare institutions to audit clinicians, diagnoses and prescribed medications, and improve clinical operations, quality management, risk assessment, and regulatory compliance.

squareTimeline.title: Start working with us. It's easy!

items.title: Plan & Prototype
items.subtitle: All you need is an idea
items.text: Share your thoughts with us, and we'll take care of everything needed to turn them into a viable plan for a real product.

list.title: Polish the idea
list.text: We will help you find the most valuable features and scenarios to create an MVP and test the market

list.title: Get project documentation
list.text: We will create all kinds of software development documentation to ensure successful delivery of a project

list.title: Receive the Estimates
list.text: We will provide reliable cost & timeframe assessments for MVP development

list.title: Get Tech Consulting
list.text: We will help you pick appropriate technologies, assess tech risks and limitations, and assemble a development team

list.title: Create a Prototype
list.text: We will design and develop a clickable prototype for you to demonstrate to early implementers or investors

items.title: Develop an MVP
items.subtitle: From the idea to market in under 3 months
items.text: Bring your specifications or raw ideas, and get a Minimum Viable Product (MVP) in less than 3 months

list.title: Refine your idea
list.text: We will help you identify the most valuable features and scenarios to develop an MVP affordably & fast

list.title: Create a Prototype
list.text: We will design and develop a prototype to showcase the product as early as possible, and gather feedback

list.title: Get Tech Consulting
list.text: We will identify any tech challenges that could impact MVP development and further product evolution

list.title: Launch an MVP
list.text: Receive end-to-end design, programming, and quality assurance services to release the product to the market

items.title: Evolve your product
items.subtitle: Scale, pivot or enhance your software solution
items.text: Get a managed development team to resolve the tech challenges of a growing product

list.title: Get an Audit
list.text: Receive an assessment of the current state of the product, the perspectives, the risks and the budget for implementing the changes

list.title: Develop a Roadmap
list.text: We will create a detailed development roadmap based on your business goals

list.title: Set up Processes
list.text: Embrace end-to-end Agile delivery practices in your sotware development project

list.title: Develop your Software
list.text: Receive a full-cycle managed team (including Business Analyst, Project Manager, UI/UX designer, developers, DevOps, and QA)

list.title: Leverage Our Expertise
list.text: Get on-demand tech leadership and consulting services to meet any tech challenges that may arise

imageBoxes.title: CultureConnect
imageBoxes.description: Culture Connect is a software platform that helps art institutions build digital interactive experiences. Looking to power-up the development of the core product, they engaged with Codex and received an end-to-end team led by the head of development. This helped to implement numerous architectural and holistic product improvements, add new features, and led to a lucrative acquisition deal with Axiell in late 2019.
imageBoxes.testimonial: “We have an ongoing relationship with Codex Software. They’re highly productive and efficient, working well together to quickly solve problems. I trust them and rate the quality of their work very highly.”

imageBoxes.title: Pronoun
imageBoxes.description: The NYC-based software startup Pronoun was building a self-publishing platform and turned to Codex Software looking for end-to-end software engineering and data science services. The collaboration helped Pronoun secure several rounds of investments, launch the product, and complete the acquisition deal with Macmillan Publishers in 2016.
imageBoxes.testimonial: “Brilliant developers, you’ll hardly find any better. Happy to work with them any day. In fact, I am already working with them on my next startup.”
